Name: Obs_TAPP
Source: Copernicus remote sensing data from OCEANCOLOUR_GLO_BGC_L4_MY_009_104

Name: Obs_DFishP
Source: Based on the average reef fish biomass from Ferrari et al. (2024)

Name: Obs_birdP
Source: Based on a rough estimate of 9.8246 tonnes of birds - PB 5.4 (Capitani et al. 2021) and netP 0.6xgrossP

Name: Obs_cetaP
Source: Based on a rough estimate of a biomass of 8762t, PB from Morissette et al. (2009) and netP 0.6*grossP

Name: Obs_Pland_livewt
Source: Environment and Natural Resources Directorate database 2010-2019 mackerel

Name: Obs_Dland_livewt
Source: Environment and Natural Resources Directorate database 2010-2019 grouper, bullseye and conger

Name: Obs_Mland_livewt
Source: Environment and Natural Resources Directorate database 2010-2019 tunas and others large pelagics

Name: Obs_Bsland_livewt
Source: Environment and Natural Resources Directorate database 2010-2019 but no SD benthos recorded

Name: Obs_Bcland_livewt
Source: Environment and Natural Resources Directorate database 2010-2019 lobster

Name: Obs_Zcland_livewt
Source: Environment and Natural Resources Directorate database 2010-2019 but no PelInverts recorded

Name: Obs_Kland_livewt
Source: Environment and Natural Resources Directorate database 2010-2019 but no Seaweeds recorded

Name: Obs_fishd_pb
Source: Average PB reported by Freire et al. (2008) for reef fishes

Name: Obs_NDJF_s_chl
Source: Remote sensing satellite data assuming Redfield and C_chl 20

Name: Obs_MJJA_s_chl
Source: Remote sensing satellite data assuming Redfield and C_chl 20
